starts.title: First Five Minutes (Tutorial Island)
starts.blurb: Step onto the tutorial island and learn how to move, interact, and craft before the wider routes.

starts.title: Aeol Envoy
starts.blurb:
Carry Aeol dispatch seals to broker storm routes.
Diplomacy and gust control keep flights on time.

starts.title: Freehands Skyrunner
starts.blurb:
Leap between rigging to supply stranded crews.
Fast mutual-aid runs earn Freehands trust.

starts.title: Root Assembly Scribe
starts.blurb:
Keep meticulous ledgers for the Root Assembly.
Paperwork and hearings bend guest-law your way.

starts.title: Moon-Eel Suburb
starts.blurb:
Swim the moon-eel canals collecting tidal favors.
Resonant insight navigates shifting currents.

starts.title: Storm Rail Mooring
starts.blurb:
Ride storm-rails across canyon gustways.
Bold maneuvers and Aeol ties cut new lanes.

starts.title: Root Depths Staging Crew
starts.blurb:
Stage caretaker dives into the root orrery.
Steady labor opens sap-lit maintenance routes.

starts.title: Shade-Walker Outpost
starts.blurb:
Guide caravans through migrating shade engines.
Stealth and wit guard against tribute hunters.

starts.title: Cloud-Burrow Loft
starts.blurb:
Wake in lofts above the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
Airborne logistics favor resonance and glidecraft.

starts.title: Amber Barge Quarters
starts.blurb:
Serve aboard memorial barges on the amber tides.
Healing rites and archives soothe mourners.

starts.title: Market of Shed Skins Stall
starts.blurb:
Run a stall within the Market of Shed Skins.
Masks and bargains pivot identities mid-stride.

starts.title: Orchard Keeper's Hut
starts.blurb:
Tend meteor-grown memories in the orchard huts.
Cooperative caretaking knits ledgers and lullabies.

endings.ending_correction: Take charge of the seasonal orrery correction.
endings.ending_unshattered_gale: Stabilize the Cloud-Burrow gustways for local crews.
endings.ending_living_wake: Open a standing wake where neighbors manage every farewell.
endings.ending_amnesty_of_names: Open an amnesty so travelers can reclaim their needed names.
endings.ending_sharecrop_of_stories: Keep the orchard's memory harvest in shared stewardship.
endings.ending_shade_treaty: Set the Treaty of Moving Shade into motion.
endings.ending_mooring_mediator: Join the Aeol rota and mediate the mooring rush.
endings.ending_market_steward: Take the first shift of the Root Assembly's steward rota.
endings.ending_galleria_steward: Turn Cartel maintenance into a public galleria cooperative.
endings.ending_freehands_regatta: Captain the Freehands regatta out of the mist.
endings.ending_cloud_cooperative: Anchor a Cloud-Burrow balcony cooperative to steady traffic.
endings.ending_saltglass_wayfinder: Guide the Saltglass caravans with your mapped corridors.
endings.ending_shed_market_retirement: Retire into the Bazaar of Shed Skins as rotation keeper.
endings.ending_rainchain_hostel: Keep the rainchain hostel bunks running at the docks.
endings.ending_root_night_auditor: Audit the Root Assembly petitions through the night shift.
endings.ending_prism_liftkeeper: Hold the prism lifts open as a trusted night steward.
endings.ending_saltglass_waystation: Steady the Saltglass waystation for caravans arriving after dark.
endings.ending_moon_eel_guest: Curate hospitality in the Moon-Eel suburb's ribcage guesthouse.
endings.ending_wake_candle_warden: Tend the vigil lamps for the ongoing Living Wake.
endings.ending_bazaar_maskbinder: Oversee the mask gallery's gentle exchanges.
endings.ending_cocoon_host_caretaker: Keep the cocoon hostel's rota warm and welcoming.
endings.ending_freehands_dispatch: Coordinate Freehands relief runs from the Saltglass cache.
endings.ending_canal_common_tide: Align Aeol and Freehands schedules through a common tide charter.
endings.ending_shared_ledger_loop: Loop Root Assembly dispatches into Quiet Ledger circulation.
endings.ending_balcony_safe_concord: Pair Aeol couriers with burrow crews through a safety concord.
endings.ending_prism_light_commons: Open the prism lifts as a commons linked to guest-law routes.
endings.ending_migrant_kithhouse: Sign the accord that links kithhouse bunks across the hubs.
endings.ending_orchard_accord: Rebuild the memory harvest into the Orchard Accord.
endings.ending_keeper_of_passways: Accept stewardship over the Startways passways.

tutorial_arrival_beach.title: First-Step Cove
tutorial_arrival_beach.text: Chalk lines and gentle lanterns mark a sheltered cove carved out for newcomers. Soft surf mutes the hum of distant hubs while practice arches shimmer within view.

choices.text: Follow the chalk-marked path inland.
Test the signal lantern to open the controls overlay.
[Hint] Movement is just choosing a numbered option or pressing Enter.
Disable tutorial hints.
Enable tutorial hints.
Approach the guest-law exit arch.

tutorial_controls_overlay.title: Controls Overlay
tutorial_controls_overlay.text:
Movement: press the number beside a choice or hit Enter for the first option.
Interact: choices marked with tags or resources will note what they spend.
Overlays: I opens inventory, T shows tags and traits, P pauses, and Q quits to desktop.

choices.text: Close the overlay and return to the cove.
Head inland to practice what you learned.
Disable tutorial hints.
Enable tutorial hints.

tutorial_hint_movement.title: Movement Prompt
tutorial_hint_movement.text: Pick numbered options to travel between nodes. The leftmost choice is always 1, and pressing Enter repeats the first option so you can move even without lifting your hand from the keyboard.

choices.text: Got it—return to the cove.
Open the controls overlay for the full list.
Disable tutorial hints.

tutorial_clearing.title: Practice Clearing
tutorial_clearing.text: A braided clearing waits inland, stocked with communal supplies and a patient listening stone. Lanterns pulse encouragement toward the workshop and the arch back to the docks.

choices.text: Collect the scattered memory seeds.
Listen to the responding stone beacon.
Examine the braiding loom under the canopy.
[Hint] Items you pick up appear in your inventory overlay (press I).
Walk the loop back toward the landing cove.

tutorial_hint_resource.title: Inventory Prompt
tutorial_hint_resource.text: Press I anytime to open your inventory overlay and confirm what you have gathered. Resources listed there feed into choices that ask for items, so you can check before committing.

choices.text: Return to the clearing.
Open the controls overlay for more reminders.
Disable tutorial hints.

tutorial_listening_stone.title: Responding Stone
tutorial_listening_stone.text: The stone hums with a gentle chord, lighting sigils whenever you tap it. Each response mirrors how story flags will echo through later hubs.

choices.text: Match the rhythm and feel the response ripple back.
[Hint] Flags you set show up under the FLAGS summary (press T).
Step away from the stone.

tutorial_hint_interact.title: Flag Prompt
tutorial_hint_interact.text: The summary line at the bottom of each screen lists FLAGS you've set so far. Press T to review them in detail and understand how earlier interactions unlocked new choices.

choices.text: Return to the responding stone.
Open the controls overlay.
Disable tutorial hints.

tutorial_workbench.title: Braiding Loom
tutorial_workbench.text: A portable loom waits with diagrams on how to weave gathered seeds into helpful anklets. The pattern promises your first upgrade if you follow it through.

choices.text: Weave the memory seed into a Light-Step anklet.
Test the anklet around the clearing.
[Hint] Upgrades live under Tags/Traits (press T).
Leave the loom.

tutorial_hint_upgrade.title: Upgrade Prompt
tutorial_hint_upgrade.text: Press T to review your Tags and Traits. Newly earned upgrades like Light-Step appear there and unlock extra routes in later hubs.

choices.text: Return to the loom.
Open the controls overlay.
Disable tutorial hints.

tutorial_exit_gate.title: Guest-Law Exit Arch
tutorial_exit_gate.text: A calm arch braided with guest-law sigils waits for travelers who complete the loop. Lanterns confirm your new anklet hum before aligning a path toward the Startways.

choices.text: Step through to the Startways Nexus.
Review the controls overlay before leaving.
Stay on the island for more practice.

sky_docks.title: Sky-Spliced Docks
sky_docks.text: Stormglass piers sway above the mist; signal-kites rattle as Aeol Nests wardens chant the day's winds. Prism Cartel runners hustle cargo while seed-compass couriers flash Startways sigils.

choices.text: (Emissary) Flash envoy seals to the Aeol warden for priority clearance.
(Sneaky) Ride a cargo hoist between patrol sweeps.
Volunteer as a docket runner until your name is called.
(Light-Step) Skip along taut mooring cables to the maintenance lift.
(People-Reader) Mirror the warden's gestures to slide ahead quietly.
Follow a seed-compass courier toward the Startways Nexus.
Accept the Aeol rota posting and settle into the mooring office.
Sign on as the rainchain hostel steward and keep the bunks humming.

root_tangle_market.title: Root Assembly Market
root_tangle_market.text: Living terraces coil around the Assembly tree, thrumming with petitioners and spice-sellers. Songbirds carry living-law updates from branch to branch.

choices.text: (Arbiter) Audit the travel ledgers to secure a formal hearing slot.
(Weaver) Braid stabilizing cords for the speaking dais, impressing the clerks.
Compile testimony for the clerks, noting every tell in the crowd.
Submit your compiled testimony for a guest-law docket.
(People-Reader) Whisper the judge's likely ruling to the crowd, earning a Freehands escort.
(Emissary) Rally Aeol outriders to ferry you toward the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
(Emissary) Broker a prism exchange to ride their courier lane into the galleria.
Spend a root-writ to fast-track your guest-law hearing docket.
Trade a favor for a Freehands glider run toward the Saltglass engines.
(Root Assembly 1+) Call in Assembly trust to open the caretaker lift.
Descend toward the orrery-of-roots caretakers.
File your steward rota and take the first shift yourself.
Close the petitions early and audit the night ledgers yourself.

prism_galleria.title: Prism Cartel Galleria
prism_galleria.text: Mirrored arcades refract the afternoon into ribbons while Cartel stewards trade favors under crystal awnings. Hovering heliostats hum as apprentices tune their beams.

choices.text: (Tinkerer) Resequence a cracked heliostat for Cartel credit.
(Cartographer) Plot the shifting aisles into a precise maintenance route.
Sign a Cartel marker pledging future service for elevator access.
(Light-Step) Balance along the suspension cables to the service lift.
(People-Reader) Read the steward's tells to secure a discreet escort.
(Emissary) Broker a chime-lift lane into the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
(Emissary) Escort Prism proofs directly to the guest-law chamber.
Spend a color baffle to signal the Saltglass engine's prism pier.
Trade a windbone token for a stewarded lift back to the Startways.
(Prism Cartel 1+) Invoke Cartel patronage for a private tram to the grotto.
(Resonant) Harmonize the galleria chimes to open the Cloud-Burrow transfer.
Post your maintenance rota as a public cooperative and oversee the shift.
Convert your private tram clearance into a shared steward shift and stay on.
Trade your pledge for the night lift roster and settle behind the desk.
Publish the prism light commons pact linking lifts to guest-law routes.

guestlaw_chamber.title: Guest-Law Chamber
guestlaw_chamber.text: Root-braided benches cradle envoys beneath a canopy of verdict sigils. Voices resonate through living wood as the Assembly convenes a pivotal hearing.

choices.text: (Arbiter) Ratify the guest-law compact for all hubs.
Spend a prism shard to flood the dais with undeniable proof.
Defer the hearing to rally Prism Cartel support.
(People-Reader) Expose a hidden clause tying the Court to the Freehands.
(Light-Step) Slip along the balcony to spy on the Prism delegation's exit route.

luminous_grotto.title: Luminous Grotto
luminous_grotto.text: Sunken prisms diffuse twilight into rippling curtains while Freehands skiffs bob in hidden coves. Bioluminescent roots mark half-forgotten escape canals.

choices.text: (Lumenar) Bend the lightwells to reveal a hidden canal and sail free.
(Healer) Tend to the wounded Freehands and earn their pledged skiff.
Cash in a favor to hire a pilot through the gloom.
Stash supplies among the phosphor roots for future runs.
(People-Reader) Sense the Freehands leader's worry and promise a future favor.
Raise your cached supplies into a Freehands regatta and promise to keep it running.
File the common tide charter so Aeol pilots match Freehands relief runs.

ending_escape.title: Hidden Canal Flight
ending_escape.text:
You slip a skiff into the phosphor canals before the patrol lights turn.
Cached crates from a dozen favors keep you ahead of every toll-chain.
By dusk, the mist remembers only the wake you chose to leave.

ending_guestlaw.title: Guest-Law Compact
ending_guestlaw.text:
You leave the chamber with the guest-law compact signed in four inks.
Dock masters swap updated ledgers, each hub agreeing to shelter travelers in turn.
No banner claims credit; the precedent simply hums through every root and rail.

ending_correction.title: Orrery Caretaker
ending_correction.text:
You post yourself in the orrery's bronze heart, feeling each pulse through sap-stained gloves.
Season after season you tune the correction, synchronizing tides, caravans, and the breath of resting elders.
Travelers speak of the caretaker, not a name, when they note how the schedule never slips.

root_orrery_concourse.title: Orrery-of-Roots Concourse
root_orrery_concourse.text: Vast living galleries spiral around a bronze-hearted trunk; saplight drips across calculating roots while caretakers whisper seasonal sums.

choices.text: (Weaver) Descend along braided harness to the Loom Gallery.
Take the freight ladder down to the Loom Gallery.
(Archivist) Follow ledger etchings toward the Memory Vault.
Consult the posted indices and head for the Memory Vault.
(Healer) Trace the sap-scented draft into the infirmary roots.
Trail the warm sap breeze toward the infirmary roots.
(Arbiter) Present your docket to the registry tiers.
Request a visitor chit for the registry tiers.
(Weaver+Arbiter) Lace consensus cords to open the caretaker dais.
(Healer+Resonant) Harmonize the pulse conduits before tending the infirmary.
(Archivist+Weaver) Pattern a schema that ushers you toward the lens cradle.
Step onto the caretaker dais at the orrery's heart.
Climb the service roots back to the Root Assembly Market.
Ride the tether back to the Startways Nexus.

root_orrery_registry.title: Root Registry Tiers
root_orrery_registry.text: Brass-sheathed root clerks hum from loam-caked abaci, stamping living writs; one pulses through your palm, 'We feel urgency by soil-scent—steady yourself.'

choices.text: (Archivist) Compile the seasonal casework into a formal root-writ.
Pledge a season of service to copy a root-writ.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Present a balanced budget to underwrite the correction crews.
(Arbiter) Argue for caretaker access, impressing the registrars.
Submit the root-writ to authorize a correction.
Sign for a caretaker introduction while voicing your case.
(Resonant) Sign root-chords requesting a caretaker introduction.
Return to the concourse tiers.

root_orrery_looms.title: Bronze Loom Gallery
root_orrery_looms.text: Suspended walkways sway above root-driven gears as bronze filaments sing against living wood.

choices.text: (Weaver) Align the loom-cantilever to draw out a bronze filament.
Offer to cover a loom shift for a bronze filament spool.
Carry the bronze filament toward the correction gearroots.
Ride the lift back to the concourse.

root_orrery_archives.title: Memory Vault Galleries
root_orrery_archives.text: Shelves of resin tablets glow with captured seasons as quiet keepers tend to whispering root-scribes.

choices.text: (Archivist) Sift seasonal ledgers for a root-writ template.
Donate courier notes to earn a copied root-writ.
Descend to the lens cradle where sap memories refract.
Return to the concourse tiers.

root_orrery_lens_cradle.title: Sap Lens Cradle
root_orrery_lens_cradle.text: A suspended basin of luminous sap refracts predictions while bronze arms hold half-formed lenses in gentle tension.

choices.text: (Healer) Sing the sap flows clear, shaping a lens.
(Archivist) Calibrate the recorded seasons for a stable lens.
Promise to report your findings to borrow a sap lens.
Carry the sap lens to the alignment platform.
Return to the memory vaults.

root_orrery_infirmary.title: Sap Infirmary Roots
root_orrery_infirmary.text: Caretakers soothe stressed roots in warm pools while bronze splints hum with quiet corrective tones.

choices.text: (Healer) Massage the root knots, earning the caretakers' trust.
Apply bronze filament braces to stabilize fractures.
Commit to stay the season tending the correction.
Return to the concourse tiers.

root_orrery_dais.title: Caretaker Dais
root_orrery_dais.text: Bronze gimbals rise from the living trunk, their roots thrumming with equations waiting to be sung back into season.

choices.text: (Weaver) Listen for the chord of seasons within the gears.
(Archivist) Inspect the correction logs for missing entries.
(Healer) Warm the sap channels feeding the dais.
(Arbiter) Evaluate the steward disputes over cadence.
Approach the resonance controls.
Claim staging quarters for the Root Depths crews.
Return to the concourse tiers.
Trace the mirrored dunes route toward the Saltglass Expanse.

root_orrery_resonance.title: Resonance Conduit
root_orrery_resonance.text: Bronze veins glow with waiting power; every root beat expects sanction before the correction can resume.

choices.text: Submit the root-writ to authorize a correction.
(Arbiter) Cite precedent to fast-track the correction.
Step back to gather missing components.

root_orrery_threading.title: Gearroot Loom
root_orrery_threading.text: Living gears clack patiently, awaiting the conductive braid that will restart their seasonal song.

choices.text: Seat the bronze filament through the gearroots.
(Weaver) Hum the filament into sync with the roots.
Admit you need a bronze filament and retreat to the loom.

root_orrery_focus.title: Lens Alignment Platform
root_orrery_focus.text: Bronze arms arc overhead, ready to cradle a sap lens that can read the tree-machine's upcoming tides.

choices.text: Set the sap lens into the focusing cradle.
(Healer) Coax clarity from the sap lens before placement.
Realize you still need the sap lens.

root_orrery_tuning.title: Tuning Gallery
root_orrery_tuning.text: Root-crowns and bronze rings spin in cautious counterpoint, waiting for a guiding hand to set their season.

choices.text: (Weaver) Weave the bronze and root pulses into a new cadence.
(Archivist) Record the adjustments and signal the caretakers.
(Healer) Channel restorative sap to smooth the change.
(Arbiter) Affirm the correction in the Assembly ledgers.
(Root-Speaker) Commune directly with the thinking tree.
Hold the correction steady while the caretakers finish.
Step away, leaving the correction incomplete.

root_orrery_mentor.title: Root-Speaker Mentor
root_orrery_mentor.text: A Root-Speaker rests within a hollowed node, listening to sap-currents and translating them into hushed counsel.

choices.text: (Root-Speaker) Echo the mentor's cadence into the sap chorus.
Share a breath with the mentor and match their cadence.
Discuss the correction schedule in greater detail.
Return quietly to the concourse.

startways_nexus.title: Startways Nexus
startways_nexus.text: A colossal seed-compass suspends over the void, its gimbals swiveling as routes align and distant hubs flare within each arch.

choices.text: (Ledger) Consult the route steward perched on the compass stem.
(Tides) Study the Moon-Eel archway as tides lap across its frame.
(Gales) Climb the storm-rail dais that angles into roaring sky.
(Roots) Step through the Root Assembly promenade door.
(Orrery) Descend the sap-lit stairs toward the orrery-of-roots.
(Prism) Follow the prism-lit corridor toward the Cartel galleria.
(Masks) Descend toward the Night Market of Shed Skins.
(Updraft) Return along the tether to the Aeol moorings.
(Envoy) Present cross-hub chits to convene a guest-law summit.
(Emissary) Convene a cross-hub summit in the guest-law chamber.
(Emissary) Lead Aeol outriders on a guided drop toward the Saltglass Expanse.
(Offering) Spend a map sliver to align a mirror corridor into the Saltglass lanes.
(Escort) Surrender a windbone token for an updraft escort into the Cloud-Burrow.
(Aeol 1+) Request a priority wind-rail from the steward.
(Cartographer) Trace the compass stem to thread a drop into the Saltglass caravans.
(Resonant) Sing the nexus chords into phase with the Cloud-Burrow chimes.
(Freehands 1+) Relay supply rosters straight into the Saltglass caravans.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) File a ledger itinerary that drops you beside the Saltglass engines.
(Aeol 1+) Signal an outrider shift to sling you toward the Cloud-Burrow balconies.
(Cartographer) Map thermal threads for a guided descent into the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
Post the migrant kithhouse accord linking every hub's rest decks.

nexus_steward.title: Quiet Ledger Steward
nexus_steward.text: A Quiet Ledger scribe polishes bronze seed-tokens, charting balances owed for each route. They offer whispered summaries of distant starts.

choices.text: (Tides) Ask about the Moon-Eel Suburb's tides.
(Gales) Ask about the storm-rail moorings above the canyons.
(Survey) Thank the steward and study the compass again.
(Freehands 1+) Approve relief manifests and hitch a lift to their cache.
Loop the Root Assembly dispatches into Quiet Ledger circulation for good.
(Keeper) Accept the ledgers and become the Keeper of Passways.

nexus_moon_eel_trial.title: Moon-Eel Archway
nexus_moon_eel_trial.text: Pearlescent ribs rise from a suspended tide-pool, the arch breathing with the pulse of a slumbering leviathan. Each swell reveals glimpses of aquatic tenements.

choices.text: (Sneaky) Slip between the tidal pulses and trace the hidden current.
(Healer) Hum a tide-mending hymn to soothe the arch's restlessness.
(Calm) Match your breath to the tide and step through as it ebbs.
(Retreat) Let the arch settle and step back toward the compass.

nexus_moon_eel_reward.title: Moon-Eel Suburb Echo
nexus_moon_eel_reward.text: Cool brine spirals up your arms as ribcage homes ignite with lanterns. Canal-keepers beckon from within the leviathan's bones, promising sanctuary for the subtle and the gentle.

choices.text: (Mark) Let the vision fade and note the route for later.
Accept canal hospitality and linger among the ribcage homes.
Carry their sanctuary tidings back through the luminous grotto.
(Root-Speaker) Listen through the rib-boughs for orchard callings.
(Dreamwalker) Drift with the eel's memory tide toward the cocoons.

nexus_storm_trial.title: Storm-Rail Dais
nexus_storm_trial.text: A skeletal platform spins in captured gale-force winds. Rails flare with static as canyon drafts scream through stormglass vanes.

choices.text: (Resonant) Sing a countercurrent to anchor the rail's frequency.
(Cartographer) Plot the gust vectors and stride in their lee.
(Steady) Brace against the railing and edge forward between surges.
(Retreat) Descend before the winds wrench the dais apart.

nexus_storm_reward.title: Storm Rail Vista
nexus_storm_reward.text: You feel the thin air bite as mooring-spires arc above roaring canyons. Wind-rail sailors salute you, neon pennants snapping while storm engines glow.

choices.text: (Chart) Record the path and let the winds calm.
Ride the wind-rail onward to the storm rail moorings.
Signal an escort glide back toward the Sky-Spliced Docks.
Send the mapped gusts toward Saltglass outriders preparing a convoy.
(Storm-Conductor) Tune the captured gale toward the Cloud-Burrow stormloom.

moon_eel_intro.title: Moon-Eel Suburb
moon_eel_intro.text: Aquatic tenements cling inside a moon-eel's ribcage, their windows pulsing with low tide glow. Residents ferry messages along bubble elevators and whisper of Startways favors.

choices.text: Slip along canal spines toward the Startways Nexus.
Navigate the flood channels toward the luminous grotto.
Glide along bubble elevators toward the cocoon hostel.
(Tide-Singer) Harmonize the tide glow to open a quiet retreat toward the Amber Tides cloister.
Stay on to curate the ribcage guesthouse and mind the tide diaries.

storm_rail_intro.title: Storm Rail Mooring
storm_rail_intro.text: Wind-rail moorings straddle a canyon mouth, each rail humming with charged gusts. Aeol riggers trade gust scripts while Freehands couriers lash down cargo.

choices.text: Ride the wind-rail down to the Sky-Spliced Docks.
Follow the compass line back to the Startways Nexus.
Chart a supply glide toward the Saltglass Expanse.
(Storm-Conductor) Lash the charged winds into a drop toward the Cloud-Burrow threshold.

saltglass_expanse.title: Saltglass Expanse
saltglass_expanse.text: Mirrored dunes ripple around migrating glass-reefs while walking shade engines stride overhead, casting cool rivers of shadow.

choices.text: (Cartographer) Align the mirrored dune ridges with the reef migration.
Enter the walking shade engine's bazaar decks.
(Sneaky) Ghost along the engine struts toward the southern obelisk.
(Scout) Scale a mirror dune to flag a clear caravan lane.
(Lumenar) Refract the dunes' glare to reveal the buried orrery route.
(Tinkerer) Tune the envoy dais so caravan speakers can gather.
(Lumenar) Signal Aeol outriders for a direct Startways flight.
Spend a favor to hitch a basket-lift into the Cloud-Burrow Warrens.
(Resonant) Harmonize dune song with Aeol lifts and glide into the Cloud-Burrow.
Trade a map sliver to plot a Startways drop point.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Call in ledger pilots to escort you to the caravan council.
(Freehands 1+) Rally outriders to ferry mutual aid between stranded caravans.
Trail the memory-laden caravan toward the Starfallen Orchard.
Follow the tuned root-paths back to the Caretaker Dais.
Lock in your mapped corridors and guide the caravans through a shared shade rota.

saltglass_shade_bazaar.title: Shade Engine Bazaar
saltglass_shade_bazaar.text: Canvas streets coil inside a walking shade engine; caravans barter under glass awnings while pistons thrum with migrating rhythm.

choices.text: (Tinkerer) Recalibrate the cooling vanes to earn a shade key.
Haul spare struts to the repair cradle.
(Cartographer) Trade dune coordinates for a map sliver.
(Sneaky) Shadow a Freehands runner toward the reef scouts.
(Sneaky+Lumenar) Diffuse the echo-market's glare to chart contraband routes.
(Cartographer+Glasswright) Fuse mirrored charts into a private prism vault.
(Lumenar+Tinkerer) Retrofit a glider harness to surf the shade thermals.
Step back out into the mirrored dunes.

saltglass_shade_workshop.title: Shade Engine Workshop
saltglass_shade_workshop.text: Glass-lathes hum beside cooling cisterns as artisans tune shade vanes for the migrating caravans.

choices.text: (Tinkerer) Assemble a color baffle from refractor scraps.
(Sneaky) Pocket a map sliver from the shipping manifest.
(Lumenar) Fuse the glass seams to steady the walking city.
Ask the Glasswright mentor to review your latticework.
Return to the bazaar's central deck.

saltglass_echo_lattice.title: Echo-Market Lattice
saltglass_echo_lattice.text: Contraband choruses shimmer along suspended wires, each songline masking a trade route beneath resonant camouflage.

choices.text: Sync the song routes with Freehands relief paths.
Archive the encoded melodies for Quiet Ledger auditors.
Fade back toward the bazaar decks before the chorus shifts.

saltglass_prism_cache.title: Mirrored Prism Cache
saltglass_prism_cache.text: Interlocking panes fold around a recessed vault, projecting overlays of root corrections and shade migrations as you work.

choices.text: Etch the composite charts into a portable prism for the Root Assembly.
Seal the vault and return the mirrored panels to the bazaar.
Carry the mirrored insights toward the sharecrop commons.
(Root-Speaker) Thread the prism pulses into orchard sap channels.

saltglass_glider_bay.title: Thermal Glider Bay
saltglass_glider_bay.text: Shade engine riggers suspend glider harnesses above roaring vents, timing launch windows with caravans on the move.

Glide down to the mirrored dunes near the Freehands cache.

Divert a tithe toward Freehands relief runners.

saltglass_freehands_cache.title: Freehands Relief Cache

Log the cache usage for Quiet Ledger reimbursements.
Return to the bazaar with remaining supplies.
Post yourself at the cache ledger and coordinate every relief dispatch.

saltglass_glass_reef.title: Migratory Glass Reef
saltglass_glass_reef.text: Fractal ridges of living glass surge like a slow tide, caravan tents lashed to their mirrored spines beneath roaming shade engines.

saltglass_obelisk_north.title: Northern Glint Obelisk
saltglass_obelisk_north.text: A mirrored spire pierces the dunes, refracting the shade engine's shadow into sweeping compass arcs.

saltglass_obelisk_south.title: Southern Glint Obelisk

saltglass_obelisk_east.title: Eastern Glint Obelisk
saltglass_obelisk_east.text: The eastern obelisk pivots above a sea of mirrored dunes, its beam catching distant shade engines in prismatic arcs.

choices.text: (Cartographer) Align the eastern glint with your star chart.

saltglass_glint_merge_ne.title: Glint Alignment Confluence
saltglass_glint_merge_ne.text: Northern and eastern beams overlap in a lattice of ghost-light, humming with routes waiting to be tied off.

choices.text: (Cartographer) Weave in the northern glint pathways.

Steer the reflections into a safe corridor toward the Moon-Eel Suburb.

saltglass_glint_merge_ring.title: Triangulation Ring
saltglass_glint_merge_ring.text: Three glint obelisks cast intersecting halos, a mirrored ring spinning fast enough to etch a permanent route.

choices.text: (Cartographer) Seal the triangulation with the southern obelisk.

saltglass_treaty_alignment.title: Treaty Dais of Moving Shade
saltglass_treaty_alignment.text: Prism panels unfurl as your shade key slots into place, the walking city's shadow forming a parliament of light.

choices.text: (Cartographer) Proclaim the Treaty of Moving Shade.

mentor_glasswright_intro.title: Glasswright Kilnback
mentor_glasswright_intro.text: A master glasswright rides a kiln-backed crawler, sketching shade lattices in hovering light.

mentor_glasswright_trial.title: Glasswright Trial Loom

mentor_glasswright_award.title: Glasswright Accord

Thank the mentor and step back into the workshop.

cloud_burrow_threshold.title: Cloud-Burrow Threshold
cloud_burrow_threshold.text: Honeycombed isles hang upside-down overhead, their streets braided around burrow balconies while wind-moles scurry along inverted rails.

cloud_burrow_inverted_plaza.title: Inverted Plaza
cloud_burrow_inverted_plaza.text: Vendors hang beneath the plaza's stone belly, trading wind-tethered wares while passerby stride along upside-down streets.

cloud_burrow_balcony_warrens.title: Burrow Balconies
cloud_burrow_balcony_warrens.text: Wind-mole families lounge in hammocks slung beneath the stone, their dens opening onto dangling porches fragrant with sun-baked roots.

cloud_burrow_guest_ledger.text: The mole matriarch inks your name beside the guest whistles and gestures toward hammocks reserved for trusted allies.

cloud_burrow_resonant_wells.title: Resonant Wells
cloud_burrow_resonant_wells.text: Stone flutes wind through the cavern, channeling updrafts into a trembling chord that keeps the warrens aloft.

cloud_burrow_windbone_forum.title: Windbone Forum

cloud_burrow_signway_balcony.title: Signway Balcony

cloud_burrow_signway_forum.title: Signed Gust Moot
cloud_burrow_signway_forum.text: Community representatives circle a suspended ledger, palms flickering in gust-hand phrases to balance passage lanes.

cloud_burrow_signway_well.text: Luminous cords sway beside the updraft well, each gesture translating into soft pulses that calm the gale.

cloud_burrow_echo_span.title: Echo Span

cloud_burrow_hidden_cache.text: Behind a tessellated hatch, suspended maps pulse with skip-trajectory ink tracing seams between gust lanes.

mentor_rift_skipper_intro.text: A rift-skipper lounges between suspended anchors, eyes tracking unseen seams as they test a ring of phase-tuning stones.

cloud_burrow_tunnel_survey.text: Luminous lichen paints the burrow walls while pressure-gauges tick, the air thick with drifting soil motes.

choices.text: Present your guest-law braid for entry.
(Trickster) Swap masks with a mouser of borrowed selves and slip inside laughing.
(Emissary) Pledge cross-hub courtesy to the sentinel and secure a guest mark.
Return to the Startways Nexus.

shed_market_shed_bazaar.title: Bazaar of Shed Skins
shed_market_shed_bazaar.text: Stalls shimmer with hanging husks, vendors swapping stories of the selves they've molted while charters of consent hum above the crowd.

choices.text: Browse rows of shed selves cataloged for barter.
Inspect the metamorph stalls where husks are weighed.
Follow chrysalis steam toward the cocoons' hostel alcove.
(Arbiter) Adjudicate a dispute over a shared adolescence.
(Sneaky+Resonant) Blend into the hush chorus echoing beneath the stalls.
(Trickster+Lumenar) Cast mirage-lanterns to access the mask gallery.
(Dreamwalker+Healer) Tend the cocoon chorus and follow the shared dreamway.
Trail the lantern stream toward the name archives.
Hang your last borrowed mask and assume the rotation desk for good.

shed_market_metamorph_stalls.title: Metamorph Stalls
shed_market_metamorph_stalls.text: Glass-backed counters display husks cooling on hooks while ethicists tally consent slips and metamorphs trade tips on easing into new selves.

choices.text: Help the appraisers sort claim slips into proper ledgers.
(Trickster) Stage a persona-swap demonstration to ease the nervous queue.
(Emissary) Convene the stallholders about a shared amnesty pledge.
Trace the refraction spines toward the ledger's witnessing window.

shed_market_molting_appraisers.title: Molting Appraisers
shed_market_molting_appraisers.text: Ledger keepers rotate molted skins beneath glowstones, matching each to its consent braid before filing tonight's exchanges.

choices.text: Sort the claim slips into ledger order, calming the backlog.
Pocket an unclaimed slip as payment for the meticulous work.
(Arbiter) Compare conflicting ledgers until every entry aligns.
Borrow splicer tools to salvage a damaged husk.

shed_market_skin_splicer_lab.title: Skin Splicer Lab
shed_market_skin_splicer_lab.text: Steam curls above tables where technicians stitch consent sigils into reclaimed skins, double-checking that each splice honors its origin.

choices.text: Stitch consent sigils so each reclaimed skin keeps its story intact.
(Lumenar) Maintain the vats' glow so new selves don't smear.
Carry the splicers' notes to the ledger window for safekeeping.
Return the borrowed tools before anyone panics.

shed_market_identity_vault.title: Identity Vault
shed_market_identity_vault.text: Shelves of sealed husks line a cooled vault, each tagged with testimony ribbons awaiting the amnesty filing.

choices.text: Restore archived names to the crates they nearly lost.
(Lumenar) Paint the shelves with gentle truthlight glyphs.
Deliver the claim slip toward the proof counter queue.
Slip back to the appraisers' tables.

shed_market_identity_proof_counter.title: Identity Proof Counter
shed_market_identity_proof_counter.text: Clerks flick between mirrored panes, confirming that each visitor's current face aligns with their consent braids before issuing passage tokens.

choices.text: Submit the molting claim slip you secured from the vault.
(Arbiter) Cite market precedent guaranteeing provisional identity.
(Lumenar) Cast a truthlight halo so the queue sees you clearly.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Reference your ledger credit to vouch for the claim.
Step away from the counter before deciding.

shed_market_trickster_swapmeet.title: Trickster Swapmeet
shed_market_trickster_swapmeet.text: Performers juggle voice boxes and masks, demonstrating how to trade selves without breaking consent ledgers.

choices.text: Juggle borrowed personas to relax the anxious queue.
(Trickster) Orchestrate a daring multi-mask trade for the waiting patrons.
Palm an unclaimed slip while everyone watches the routine.
Guide a jittery metamorph toward the Dreamwalker's seam.

shed_market_emissary_forum.title: Emissary Forum
shed_market_emissary_forum.text: Stallholders cluster beneath rotating husks, debating how the amnesty charter should protect visitors wearing borrowed faces tonight.

choices.text: Draft a shared amnesty statement for the ledger clerks to review.
(Emissary) Call in cross-hub observers to witness the pledges.
Ask the pledgers to rehearse within the pledge chorus alcove.
Return to the metamorph stalls.

shed_market_arbiter_lattice.title: Arbiter Lattice
shed_market_arbiter_lattice.text: Threads of annotated precedent hang like a loom, each knot linking a past dispute about temporary selves to the current amnesty push.

choices.text: Review testimonies until contradictions unravel into clarity.
(Arbiter) Issue a binding lattice affirming portable identities for the night.
Forward the reconciled cases to the charter antechamber clerks.
Return to the appraisers' worktables.

shed_market_lumenar_refraction.title: Refraction Spines
shed_market_lumenar_refraction.text: Lumenar rods bloom over the stalls, bending light so every shifting face holds steady edges for the clerks watching from above.

choices.text: Hang glow-sashed lanterns to make each metamorph legible.
(Lumenar) Weave a recognition halo that follows every borrowed face.
Channel the steady lights toward the Dreamwalker seam.
Return to the metamorph stalls below.

shed_market_quiet_ledger_window.title: Quiet Ledger Window
shed_market_quiet_ledger_window.text: Clerks observe from a high window, annotating who has proof enough to carry a borrowed self beyond the market.

choices.text: Submit reorganized testimonies for docketing.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Request an expedited amnesty docket for the night.
Relay the pledgers toward the chorus alcove.
Return to the identity vault for more records.

shed_market_pledge_chorus.title: Pledge Chorus
shed_market_pledge_chorus.text: An amphitheater of layered husks resounds with rehearsed introductions, each metamorph practicing their chosen name for the clerks.

choices.text: Rehearse the pledge until every voice steadies on its new name.
(Trickster) Break the tension with quick improv masks.
Lead the chorus toward the charter antechamber.
Disperse back through the bazaar to recruit more voices.

shed_market_charter_antechamber.title: Charter Antechamber
shed_market_charter_antechamber.text: Clerks spread the night's petitions across a long table, waiting for proof bundles before forwarding them to the charter workshop.

choices.text: File the reconciled docket with the charter clerks.
Seat the pledge chorus beneath luminous witness marks.
Sign the amnesty register alongside the pledge chorus.
Loop back through the pledge chorus to gather more support.

shed_market_identity_broker.title: Identity Broker's Pavilion
shed_market_identity_broker.text: Ledger-slates glow with columns of retired names while a broker smiles through three alternating faces, offering contracts for who you might become tonight.

choices.text: Evaluate the ledger of molted names awaiting guardianship.
(Lumenar) Ignite a truthlight to expose fraudulent moltings.
Accept a borrowed persona for the evening crowd.
Return to the bazaar thoroughfare.

shed_market_echo_arcade.title: Echo Arcade
shed_market_echo_arcade.text: Curtained stalls pulse with murmured identities, resonance threads guiding whispers through hidden deal-mirrors.

choices.text: Tune the hush chorus toward the ledger court to expose fraud.
Redirect the chorus toward Freehands caretakers awaiting relief.
Slip back into the bazaar flow before the echoes shift.

shed_market_mask_gallery.title: Mask Gallery
shed_market_mask_gallery.text: A gallery of borrowed visages glitters under lantern prisms, each mask whispering the memories it once carried.

choices.text: Catalogue the masks for ledger archivists awaiting new exhibits.
Stage an impromptu lantern show to fund the mutual aid stall.
Return the masks to their hooks and rejoin the bazaar.
Bind the gallery's borrowed faces into a calm rotation you oversee.

shed_market_dreamway_coop.title: Dreamway Mutual Aid Coop
shed_market_dreamway_coop.text: Cocoons line a quiet alcove where healers and dreamwalkers weave shared rest for travelers molting new selves.

choices.text: Coordinate shared dreams that guide aid to the overworked caretakers.
Record the restful patterns for Quiet Ledger stewards.
Wake gently and drift back to the bazaar.

shed_market_shadow_exchange.title: Shadow Exchange
shed_market_shadow_exchange.text: Braided shade cords anchor contracts for shared silhouettes, clerks ensuring every traded shadow can still find its owner at dawn.

choices.text: Study the contracts stitched from shade thread.
(Emissary) Broker mutual custody of a shared silhouette between travelers.
Trade your shadow IOU for a market berth.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Audit the shadow contracts to redirect patron funding.
(Freehands 1+) Build a mutual aid loop for molt refugees waiting nearby.
Slip away toward the mirage canal.

shed_market_quiet_ledger_fund.title: Quiet Ledger Patron Hall
shed_market_quiet_ledger_fund.text: Ledger patrons weigh amber donations beside contracts, debating how to stabilize the bazaar's shifting identities.

choices.text: Earmark funding for the charter workshop's legal support.
Divert a stipend toward the Freehands dreamway coop.
Conclude the audit and return to the shadow exchange.

shed_market_freehands_network.title: Freehands Molt Network
shed_market_freehands_network.text: Volunteers distribute shared skins, meal chits, and rest schedules to travelers awaiting their next self.

choices.text: Coordinate aid packages with the dreamway coop.
Report usage totals back to the Quiet Ledger patrons.
Return to the bazaar with renewed purpose.

shed_market_name_lanterns.title: Name Lantern Stream
shed_market_name_lanterns.text: Lanterns bob along a suspended canal, each etched with names gently retired, waiting for caretakers to walk beside them.

choices.text: Trace the lanterns cataloging castoff monikers.
(Lumenar) Reignite a dim lantern so its bearer feels seen.
(Trickster) Rearrange lantern order to spark conversations between strangers.
Return to the bazaar.

shed_market_ledger_court.title: Ledger Court
shed_market_ledger_court.text: A circle of clerks and keepers review petitions for identity amnesty, quills scratching beside jars of shed voices.

choices.text: Listen to the arbitrators weigh petitions.
(Arbiter) Cite guest-law precedent for shared custody of a name.
(Emissary) Invite Aeol witnesses to endorse the ruling for other hubs.
Depart toward the shadow exchange.

shed_market_lumen_stage.title: Lumen Stage
shed_market_lumen_stage.text: Performers shed light like cloaks, projecting constellations of the names they've retired while the crowd hums the chorus of who they became.

choices.text: Watch luminaries shed borrowed glows across the crowd.
(Lumenar) Project your radiance to reveal hidden names ready for amnesty.
(Trickster) Sync a playful echo that loosens tensions among traders.
Return to the bazaar.

shed_market_cocoon_hostel.title: Cocoon Hostel
shed_market_cocoon_hostel.text: Suspended cocoons sway gently, each cradle hosting travelers between selves while caretakers brew teas that steady shifting identities.

choices.text: Rest among the cocoons and listen to whispered rebirths.
(Emissary) Pair travelers with guides who knew their former selves.
(Lumenar) Bathe the cocoons in steady glow so sleepers wake gently.
Seek the Dreamwalker tending the deepest cocoons.
Stay to run the cocoon rota and keep the teas brewing warm.

shed_market_wandering_archive.title: Wandering Archive
shed_market_wandering_archive.text: Archivists carry shelves on their backs, cataloging every traded name with footnotes on consent, continuity, and future claims.

choices.text: Catalog the traded identities you recognized from other hubs.
(Arbiter) Flag contradictory contracts for renewed consent.
(Emissary) Add guest-law footnotes from other hubs to the archive.
Slip through the shelves toward the mirage canal.

shed_market_mirage_canal.title: Mirage Canal
shed_market_mirage_canal.text: Water mirrors ripple with glimpses of who you might be tomorrow, ferriers steering gondolas shaped like shed skins.

choices.text: Follow the mirrored water toward the rally of new names.
(Trickster) Send ripples carrying secret jokes about past selves.
(Emissary) Lead visiting dignitaries safely along the reflections.
Return to the shadow exchange.

shed_market_molt_rally.title: Molt Rally
shed_market_molt_rally.text: Crowds celebrate as travelers trade sashes of past achievements, drafting accords to carry multiple selves respectfully.

choices.text: Join the crowd exchanging borrowed selves and swap stories.
(Emissary) Draft a pact for portable identities recognized across hubs.
(Arbiter) Ensure each persona is archived with consent before release.
(Lumenar) Raise a lantern chorus to celebrate every change.

shed_market_charter_workshop.title: Charter Workshop
shed_market_charter_workshop.text: Tables overflow with petitions, testimony ribbons, and blank charters awaiting signatures for the Amnesty of Names.

choices.text: Compile testimonies from the bazaar disputes.
Infuse the charter with truthlight sigils.
Gather signatories from the rally of portable identities.
Proclaim the Amnesty of Names across the market.
Step back to the bazaar.

mentor_dreamwalker_intro.title: Dreamwalker Concierge
mentor_dreamwalker_intro.text: A Dreamwalker with eyes like closed moons invites you to walk the seam between who you were and who you might drift into.

choices.text: Accept the Dreamwalker's invitation into the seam.
(Trickster) Mirror their shifting cadence to show comfort with change.
Thank them and return to the cocoons.

mentor_dreamwalker_trial.title: Dreamlace Trial
mentor_dreamwalker_trial.text: Threads of forgotten selves lace around you, the Dreamwalker asking you to guide them toward a shared cadence without losing your core.

choices.text: Follow them through a braid of half-remembered moments.
(Emissary) Convene the dream-selves into a gentle council.
(Lumenar) Light the path so no identity slips into shadow.
Step back to the hostel to steady yourself.

mentor_dreamwalker_confluence.title: Dream Confluence
mentor_dreamwalker_confluence.text: The Dreamwalker weaves a pool of still thought, waiting to see if you can anchor both your waking self and the personas you escorted.

choices.text: Hold the confluence until every self hums in harmony.
(Arbiter) Balance the voices before the pool settles.
Release the visions and return to the hostel.

mentor_dreamwalker_awakened.title: Dreamwalker's Benediction
mentor_dreamwalker_awakened.text: Satisfied, the Dreamwalker places a ribbon of shared memory in your palm, offering the mantle of a traveler who can cross dreams.

choices.text: Accept the ribbon and embrace the Dreamwalker mantle.
Bow with gratitude and return to the cocoons.
Carry the dream ribbon toward the orchard's dream nursery.

orchard_keeper_hut.title: Orchard Keeper's Hut
orchard_keeper_hut.text: Meteor-fruit hang from rafters like lanterns, each pulsing with whispers of seasons past. Ledger-boards and grafting tools crowd the hut, inviting you to steward the memories stored here.

choices.text: (Resonant) Hum with the rafters until the stored fruit echo your pitch.
(Cartographer) Study the pinned root-maps to plot the ripest rows.
Step outside into the meteoric grove.
Offer to log today's gleanings for the sharecrop commons.

starfallen_orchard_meteoric_gate.title: Meteoric Gate
starfallen_orchard_meteoric_gate.text: Meteor-split trunks arch overhead, humming as orchardists check ledgers hung from branches. Dew that remembers every footfall beads along the path ahead.

choices.text: (Resonant) Trade chords with the gatekeeper to align the grove's pulse.
(Cartographer) Trace the meteor scars to orient the next harvest rows.
(Cartographer+Glasswright) Align mirrored root maps to open a harmonic passage.
Shadow the orchardists toward the echo press hall.
Peel away along the saltglass trade path.

starfallen_orchard_echo_press.title: Echo Press Hall
starfallen_orchard_echo_press.text: Copper presses squeeze starlit juice into memory flasks while archivists whisper transcripts. The air tastes of resin and rain recalled from distant harvests.

choices.text: Help catalogue the jars of remembered rain.
(Glasswright) Recalibrate the prismatic decanters to catch stray memories.
(Glasswright+Root-Speaker) Fuse saplight and latticework to balance the press.
(Dreamwalker+Healer) Dream a restorative blend for weary orchardists.
(Healer) Massage sap-weary hands with meteor balm.
(Favor) Trade a favor for a private memory graft.

starfallen_orchard_memory_rows.title: Memory Rows
starfallen_orchard_memory_rows.text: Rows of luminous fruit sway with chimes of stored voices, each branch etched with meteor glass tallies. Orchardists nod as you pass, their satchels heavy with stories owed.

choices.text: Follow the furrow toward the meteor cradle.
(Cartographer) Note the resonance lines and update your root map.
(Resonant) Lead a lullaby to settle the most burdened branches.
(Tide-Singer+Cartographer) Chart tidal graft rotations for the sharecrop canals.
Gather shared fruit for the coming commons.

starfallen_orchard_harmonic_map.title: Harmonic Mapping Glade
starfallen_orchard_harmonic_map.text: Resonance threads weave across etched root maps, projecting overlapping songlines of the orchard's harvest routes.

choices.text: Anchor the harmonic overlay to guide future gleaners.
Carry the humming map toward the sharecrop commons.
Deliver the harmonic chart to the tidal channel loom.
(Root-Speaker) Anchor the songlines into the meteor cradle's roots.

starfallen_orchard_prism_roots.title: Prism-Root Workshop
starfallen_orchard_prism_roots.text: Sap conduits spiral through glass prisms, refracting memory light into roots awaiting careful tending.

choices.text: Stabilize the prisms and record the procedure for the archives.
Channel the balanced sap toward ailing branches in the grove.
Dispatch a glass courier toward the Cloud-Burrow guest ledger.
(Tide-Singer) Pulse the sap with tidelines toward the Amber Tides cloister.

starfallen_orchard_dream_nursery.title: Dream Nursery
starfallen_orchard_dream_nursery.text: Cocoons hang between meteor boughs while healers braid lullabies through shared dreams of future harvests.

choices.text: Guide the restful dream toward the sharecrop volunteers.
Record the tonic formula for Quiet Ledger healers.
Guide the rested gleaners back toward the meteor gate.
(Dreamwalker) Thread the lullaby toward the Moon-Eel sanctuary.

starfallen_orchard_tidal_channel.title: Tidal Channel Loom
starfallen_orchard_tidal_channel.text: Irrigation channels shimmer with tide-memory, ready to be tuned so sharecrop fruit ripens with distant tides.

choices.text: Synchronize the tidal schedule with the sharecrop commons.
Carry the tidal insights to the Freehands collective.
Carry tide readings to the Quiet Ledger grant hall.
(Tide-Singer) Bind a currentway toward the Amber Tides cloister.

starfallen_orchard_quiet_grant.title: Quiet Ledger Grafting Grant
starfallen_orchard_quiet_grant.text: Ledger stewards tally fruit stores and allocate amber credits to sustain the commons' shared harvest.

choices.text: Apply the grant to expand the sharecrop tables.
Share a portion with the Freehands gleaner network.
Return to the meteor gate with updated tallies.

starfallen_orchard_freehands_collective.title: Freehands Gleaner Collective
starfallen_orchard_freehands_collective.text: Volunteers parcel fruit bundles and graft slips for neighboring crews, sharing stories beneath meteor-lit canopies.

choices.text: Distribute the bundles across the commons.
Log the gleaners' routes for Quiet Ledger auditors.
Carry surplus fruit toward the tidal channel.

starfallen_orchard_meteor_cradle.title: Meteor Cradle
starfallen_orchard_meteor_cradle.text: At the crater's heart, meteoric stone cradles saplings whose skins shimmer with falling starlight. Warmth rolls from the pit, smelling of ozone and fresh parchment.

choices.text: (Glasswright) Shape fused rind into lattice keys for the archive.
(Healer) Draw the meteor warmth to ease orchardists' joints.
Collect fallen starfruit to feed the commons kettle.
Circle back toward the meteoric gate.

starfallen_orchard_resonance_grove.title: Resonance Grove
starfallen_orchard_resonance_grove.text: Suspended chimes and taut vines resonate with distant thunder, carrying the grove's memory-song. Orchardists rest beneath the hum, cupping fruit to catch each echo.

choices.text: (Resonant) Thread your chord through the grove's chorus.
(Healer) Sync breath with the tenders to steady their pulse.
Carry the bottled chord toward the sharecrop fire.
Slip back through the listening rows.

starfallen_orchard_cartography_canopy.title: Cartography Canopy
starfallen_orchard_cartography_canopy.text: A lattice of ladders and meteor glass platforms reveals the grove's constellated rows. From here the orchard unfurls like a star map anchored in soil.

choices.text: (Cartographer) Chart the shifting root constellations for the ledgers.
(Glasswright) Embed prisms to catch new paths of light.
Signal your findings down to the commons crew.
Descend to the meteoric gate.

starfallen_orchard_healer_bower.title: Healer's Bower
starfallen_orchard_healer_bower.text: Curtains of woven vine enclose tables of infusions where orchardists trade breath and pulse. Meteor-steamed basins glow softly, ready to ease overworked hands.

choices.text: (Healer) Distill balm that keeps grafts from scarring.
(Resonant) Hum counterpoints to soothe the resting archivists.
Take a restorative draught and rejoin the rows.
Deliver cooled balms to the sharecrop table.

starfallen_orchard_glass_lattice.title: Glass Lattice Loom
starfallen_orchard_glass_lattice.text: Glass threads stretch between meteor stakes, each strand shimmering with captured recollections. Apprentices etch glyphs into the lattice to guide future harvests.

choices.text: (Glasswright) Tune the capillaries so memories flow evenly.
(Cartographer) Weave a star-path into the lattice for future pickers.
Archive a gleaming story for the commons jars.
Follow cooling troughs back to the meteor cradle.

starfallen_orchard_story_graft.title: Story-Graft Arbor
starfallen_orchard_story_graft.text: A living arbor waits with a hollow branch, ready to accept a sliver of your true name. Orchard keepers steady the grafting knives, eyes bright with the promise of shared memory.

choices.text: Plant a graft bearing your true name and share its charge.
Trace the new graft's pulse and promise to return.
Step away before the branch can claim you.

starfallen_orchard_graft_recovery.title: Graft Recovery Alcove
starfallen_orchard_graft_recovery.text: Lanternfruit dim to a gentle glow as keepers bandage your new graft, weaving its pulse into yours. Cooling vapors and annotated ledgers surround a circle of resting orchardists.

choices.text: (Story-Graft) Spend your graft charge to borrow a memory about the commons steward.
(Cartographer) Compare your new graft lines with the grove's star-map.
(Healer) Check the graft for safe circulation.
Carry your renewed resolve to the commons.

starfallen_orchard_sharecrop_commons.title: Sharecrop Commons
starfallen_orchard_sharecrop_commons.text: A ring of tables laden with memory fruit forms the Sharecrop, each offering labeled for public use. Neighbors and travelers arrive in turn, ready to plant and borrow stories in trust.

choices.text: Contribute your gathered fruit to inaugurate the commons.
(Resonant) Lead a broadcast so every graft echoes the invitation.
(Cartographer) Plot rotation schedules to keep the commons balanced.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Dedicate ledger grants to expand the sharecrop stores.
(Freehands 1+) Organize a gleaner network to share fruit with distant crews.
Slip away toward the saltglass expanse with new recollections.
Dedicate the memory harvest to the Orchard Accord infrastructure and oversee it.

ending_sharecrop_of_stories.title: The Sharecrop of Stories
ending_sharecrop_of_stories.text:
You publish the orchard's ledgers, turning every graft into a documented community promise.
Rotating crews tend the memory fruit, logging who watered, who harvested, and who shared.
Stories ripen into public resource rather than private archive.

ending_amnesty_of_names.title: Amnesty of Names
ending_amnesty_of_names.text:
Your amnesty charter ripples through the Startways, stamped by every ledger you petitioned.
Travelers line up to reclaim forgotten names or try on new ones without whispers trailing them.
Registrars now simply note the change and pass the quills along.

ending_unshattered_gale.title: Unshattered Gale
ending_unshattered_gale.text:
You stay to recalibrate each gust frame along the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
Wind-mole crews queue for your nod before launching, the updraft braided steady and low.
The cooperative posts your rota beside the tool hooks, marking you as the keeper of calm breezes.

ending_shade_treaty.title: Treaty of Moving Shade
ending_shade_treaty.text:
You settle the Treaty of Moving Shade beneath the caravan council's mirrored canopy.
Walking cities now align their shadows by shared schedule, cooling routes without tribute demanded.
Merchants wave the signed prisms, a treaty maintained by habit instead of heroics.

ending_living_wake.title: The Living Wake
ending_living_wake.text:
You turn the amber barges into a standing wake for anyone departing the docks.
Neighbors bring lanternbread and names to share, weaving every farewell into the tide.
By week's end the procession runs itself, held together by the quiet cues you leave behind.

ending_mooring_mediator.title: Mooring Mediator
ending_mooring_mediator.text:
You hang up your envoy sigils and take the Aeol rota seat above the moorings.
Each dawn you tune stormglass drums so incoming pilots stagger themselves instead of colliding.
When gusts snap cables, wardens call for the mediator, not the traveler you once were.

ending_market_steward.title: Market Steward Rotation
ending_market_steward.text:
You file the steward rota you drafted and stay to pilot the first market shift.
Petitioners cycle through benches you rebalanced, clerks rotating before tempers fray.
By evening the Root Assembly posts your schedule as standard practice.

ending_galleria_steward.title: Galleria Civic Cooperative
ending_galleria_steward.text:
You convert your maintenance map into a public roster for the Prism galleria lifts.
Vendors sign up for shared upkeep instead of bribed shortcuts, the rota chiming on open display.
Apprentices wave you toward the coordinator's desk you now occupy.

ending_freehands_regatta.title: Freehands Mist Regatta
ending_freehands_regatta.text:
You assemble the Freehands skiffs you cached in the grotto and lead them into the mist.
Run captains take your signals, ferrying migrants and cargo through lanes you just cleared.
By the next tide the regatta charter bears your notes for whoever captains tomorrow.

ending_cloud_cooperative.title: Cloud-Burrow Balcony Cooperative
ending_cloud_cooperative.text:
You stay behind on the Cloud-Burrow balconies to organize the coop glideway.
Families rotate watch on the tethered baskets, following the schedule you scribed on wind-proof slate.
The updraft mutters your guidelines every time a newcomer clips in.

ending_saltglass_wayfinder.title: Saltglass Wayfinder
ending_saltglass_wayfinder.text:
You lock your dune charts into the Saltglass co-op chest and claim the night shift.
Caravan captains queue for your mirrored signals, gliding through shade corridors without tribute.
The ledger lists you simply as Wayfinder on duty.

ending_shed_market_retirement.title: Shed Market Rotation Keeper
ending_shed_market_retirement.text:
You hang your final borrowed mask above the bazaar and settle into the rotation desk.
Molting patrons check in for husks and histories, trading favors you reconcile without fuss.
By closing bell the Quiet Ledger stamps you as permanent steward of the shed stalls.

ending_rainchain_hostel.title: Rainchain Hostel Steward
ending_rainchain_hostel.text:
You catalog bunk chits and hang fresh rainchain towels as ferries roll through.
Travelers swap tokens for dry hammocks under the steady rhythm you keep.
The hostel hums without fuss because you stay to mind the roster.

ending_root_night_auditor.title: Night Auditor of Roots
ending_root_night_auditor.text:
After hearings close you balance the petitions ledger by lanternlight.
Clerks slide you quiet nods while you reconcile favors into open access notes.
By dawn, the market trusts your calm sums more than any speech.

ending_prism_liftkeeper.title: Prism Liftkeeper
ending_prism_liftkeeper.text:
You take the night desk, tuning prism lifts to the cadence of working crews.
Vendors bring you coilbread while you pencil every shared ride onto the public slate.
The galleria lights stay even because you keep the rota honest.

ending_saltglass_waystation.title: Saltglass Waystation Warden
ending_saltglass_waystation.text:
You chalk mirrored arrows into the dune shelters and listen for caravan bells.
Night caravans coast in on your signals, trading gossip for cool shade.
The waystation ledger bears your initials beside every safe arrival.

ending_moon_eel_guest.title: Moon-Eel Guest Curator
ending_moon_eel_guest.text:
You settle in the ribcage hosthouse, annotating tide diaries between potluck shifts.
Residents drift through to borrow guest marks and leave baskets of brined sweets.
The suburb hums with gentle courtesy under your watch.

ending_wake_candle_warden.title: Wake Candle Warden
ending_wake_candle_warden.text:
You stand the middle watch of the wake barges, trimming wicks before each procession.
Mourners breathe easier knowing you log who needs a lantern and who can rest.
The river glows steady because you keep the candles in quiet rotation.

ending_bazaar_maskbinder.title: Maskbinder in Residence
ending_bazaar_maskbinder.text:
You hang each borrowed face back on its hook and record the stories tied to it.
Visitors leave new masks with consent slips you seal in lacquer.
The gallery becomes a calm exchange because you stay to tend every persona.

ending_cocoon_host_caretaker.title: Cocoon Hostel Caretaker
ending_cocoon_host_caretaker.text:
You make tea in the predawn hush and chart who wakes in which cocoon.
Travelers easing between selves find their blankets warmed and names spelled right.
The hostel keeps its gentle rhythm under your steady shift.

ending_freehands_dispatch.title: Freehands Dispatch Coordinator
ending_freehands_dispatch.text:
You claim a stool beside the cache ledger, logging every cord and salve that leaves.
Couriers swing by for your updated lists before sprinting into the dunes.
Relief routes stay supplied because you keep the dispatch drumbeat.

ending_canal_common_tide.title: Common Tide Charter
ending_canal_common_tide.text:
You draft a tide charter that stitches Aeol departure bells to Freehands relief runs.
Couriers now launch in alternating waves, sharing canals without jostled hulls.
The charter posts on both piers as a plain-signed schedule anyone can keep.

ending_shared_ledger_loop.title: Shared Ledger Loop
ending_shared_ledger_loop.text:
You merge Root Assembly dispatch notes with Quiet Ledger reimbursements.
Clerks swap tablets through your new loop, cross-crediting aid before disputes can bloom.
Routes stay funded because you normalized the cycle.

ending_balcony_safe_concord.title: Balcony Safety Concord
ending_balcony_safe_concord.text:
You publish a concord that pairs Aeol rosters with balcony stewards on every shift.
Couriers and residents clip the same safety charms before stepping onto windlines.
The burrow's glideways hum with mutual check-ins instead of flinches.

ending_prism_light_commons.title: Prism Light Commons
ending_prism_light_commons.text:
You unlock the prism lifts and post a commons pact linking them to guest-law routes.
Cartel stewards rotate upkeep with visiting advocates, their signatures all on one slate.
Lifts chime open to anyone carrying the new rota token.

ending_migrant_kithhouse.title: Migrant Kithhouse Accord
ending_migrant_kithhouse.text:
You circulate the kithhouse accord tying rest decks across the hubs to shared care.
Quiet Ledger stewards and Assembly hosts share pantry tallies on the same board.
Travelers find a ready bunk anywhere the accord seal hangs.

ending_orchard_accord.title: The Orchard Accord
ending_orchard_accord.text:
You braid the orchard's memory fruit harvest into a public conduit, the Orchard Accord.
Prism roots, tidal pumps, and Quiet Ledger grants now feed every hub's archive without gatekeepers.
Families queue beneath the meteor glass to draw shared memories like clean water.

ending_keeper_of_passways.title: Keeper of Passways
ending_keeper_of_passways.text:
You accept the steward's ledgers and move into the compass stem that threads every Startways arch.
Two factions' runners brief you each shift as you balance their requests against the tide of travelers.
Routes now whisper of the Keeper of Passways, a post anyone might inherit if they match your quiet balance.
